Set the percentage of damage going through armours.
Default : 50

Set the percentage of damage going through armour when one type of armour is depleted. Additive to the first value.
Default : 25

Apply a multiplier to all Corrosive and Magic damage.
Default : 100

The number of points you can invest in an attribute. Doesn't concern bonuses from statuses and equipment.
Default : 40

The damage bonus provided per Critical Chance percent when backstabbing.
Default : 0.5

The duration of Momentum and Lingering when they are triggered.
Default : 2

Set the target distance threshold which defines when do ranged weapons gets a penalty.
Default : 2

Set the base Movement penalty of Crossbows when they are equipped.
Default : -92
Require a game restart

Set the Movement penalty of Crossbows growth per level.
Default : -8
Require a game restart
Use this if you enabled Vanilla Plus on a running save and you witness most characters and items lack some Vitality.
Warning ! Use it only if you enabled Vanilla Plus in a running save and witness everything lacking Vitality. The fix might be somewhat inaccurate and can potentially break encounters. Proceed ?

Warning ! Changing the vitality scaling will break the vitality of the characters on the current map (in story mode) or on all scenes (in GM mode). It is highly recommended that you enable this option during the character creation before starting the game, or if you are in GM mode before creating your scenes. Proceed ?
Warning ! Deactivating the linear scaling will break characters vitalities again. If you do it in story mode, it is recommended to do it just before transitioning to a new act. Proceed ?

Change the vitality scaling to be linear instead of exponential. The difference of Vitality, Armours and Damage between levels are much lower, avoiding weapons fast obsolescence and making inter-levels combats more fair.
Default : off
Require a map reload. It is highly recommended to activate this option before starting a new game (during character creation), and deactivating it mid-playthrough will break all NPCs vitality.
Switch back to the exponential scaling. Break vitalities of characters on the current map (story mode), or on all scenes (GM mode).

If Corrosive or Magic damage is dealt while the corresponding armour is depleted, they will strip resistances for 2 turns. Can be stacked, the resistance loss is proportional to the damage dealt and the max vitality of the target. Can be removed with Fortified or Magic Shell.
Default : on

Enable talents from Gift Bag 4, with effects slightly adapted to Vanilla Plus gameplay.
Default : on
Require a game restart

When recovering from a hard crowd control effect, both Momentum and Lingering will always be triggered together whatever the crowd control effect it was.
Default : off
Activate fall damage when character use Jump skills or Projectile skills moving the character. Damage is not applied for Fly.

Activate fall damage when characters are victim of the Force property of some skills.
Scoundrel reduce the height tolerance for each point. Damage is not applied if the victim has Wings.

Enable the old dodge system, triggering Dodge Fatigue instead of Warmup on dodges.
Default : off

Revert Chameleon Cloak ability requirements to Polymorph 1 only.
Default : off
Require a game restart

Revert Teleport and Nether Swap targetting to unconditional.
Default : off
Require a game restart

This module transforms Cloak and Dagger, Phoenix Dive and Tactical Retreat as projectile equivalents (like Fly with Spread your wings). It applies to everyone. If some NPC still have the classic version, deactivate and reactivate this module.

Activate the stats correction formula. Strongly recommended when playing Story mode or any Adventure mod that has not been balanced for Vanilla Plus.
Default : on
Require a game restart

Activate the stats correction formula for GM mode. This is up to your preferences, but if you already created and balanced encounters, you might need to rebalance them.
Default : off
Require a game restart

The correction indice for the highest damaging attribute for NPCs. The higher it is, the lower will be the final result.
Default : 50
Require a game restart

The correction indice for damaging attribute if there is a tie between two or all three damaging attributes for NPCs. The higher it is, the lower will be the final result.
Default : 60
Require a game restart

The correction indice for the damaging attributes that are not the highest for NPCs. The higher it is, the lower will be the final result.
Default: 70
Require a game restart

Set the percentage of vitality restored when Perseverance proc.
Default : 2

Multiply the base vitality of the player characters and summons.
Default : 100
Require a game restart

The number of potions you need to drink in the same turn before receiving a warning of dizziness. Set to 0 to immediatly get a penalty after the first potion, and -1 to make potions usage brutally punishing. Default : 1.

If deactivated, you will be able to use custom attributes bonuses. Not recommended if you want to keep an overall balanced experience unless you really know what you are doing.
Default : on

Set the skill damage multiplier percentage when a staff is equipped.
Default : 10

Multiply all damages of summons (ally and enemy).
Default: +0%
Require a game restart

Multiply the base Vitality of all summons (ally and enemy).
Default : 100
Require a game restart

Set the skill damage multplier pencetage when a wand is equipped (can be doubled when dual-wielding).
Default : 5

Bonus damage (%) from surface AND cloud the character stands in.
Default : 20

Set the percentage of damage penalty when using a ranged weapon on a target within the CQB range limit.
Default : 35

Your inner demon actively watches over you. When an enemy approaches in melee range, they will be pummelled by a demonic fist dealing [1].

Gain 1 Action Point immediately at the cost of [1] Constitution for 2 turns. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.

Sets off a chain reaction that causes ice areas to explode into water puddles, dealing [1] and setting Chilled.

Explode all corpses around you, dealing [1] in the area.

Each ally consumes frozen surfaces around them, converting the frozen surfaces to Magic Armour. Recover 35% of the Magic Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Frozen, Burning and Necrofire and provides immunity to Chilled.

Each ally consumes oil surfaces around them, converting the oil surfaces to Physical Armour. Recover 35% of the Physical Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Petrified and Stunned and provides immunity to Slowed.
Explode two random grenades or arrows in the inventories of every enemy, dealing [1] and set Atrophy in a target circle.
Target character receive Sparkmaster status that make melee attacks firing sparks that can fork twice at nearby enemies. Each spark hit deals [1].

Consume oil surfaces around you and convert them to Physical Armour. Recover 35% of the Physical Armour damage taken during the last turn and for the two next turns. Removes Petrified and Stunned and provides immunity to Slowed.
Unlock Whirlwind and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [1] (amount depends on your level). Increases damage by [2]% and increase maximum Vitality by 15%.
Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area if you have sight on them.
Deals [1] to the target character and set Atrophy. If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory.
Incarnate learns how to go invisible and strike foes with a corrosive slash. Increases damage by [1]% and maximum Vitality by 15%.
Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 3 Action Points next turn. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.
Transmute your skin with elements to gain new properties.
Deal [1] damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies.

Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to weapon attacks and weapon-based skills (dependent upon size of poison area cleared) for 2 turns and your weapon attacks now also set Acid for 1 turn (3 turns if Venom Coating is also active).
Reset all cooldowns but remove your armours for 2 turns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned, Bleeding, Momentum and Lingering.
Receive Sparkstriker status. This causes your melee attacks to create a Spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy, dealing [1].

For 2 turns, your target character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration. Once the effect expires, the character receive Forbearance for 2 turns, preventing any other death resist effect to be applied while it is active.
Deal [1] damage. Damage is doubled if you are sneaking or invisible.
Destroy [1] on target enemy. They are Terrified for 1 turn.
Throw an explosive trap at target location. Trap takes 1 turn to activate. When active, the trap will explode when a character approaches it, dealing [1].
Damage is based on your level and trigger the additional skill bonus from Intelligence.
Damage is based on your basic attack and trigger the additional bonus from both Strength and Intelligence.
Incarnate learns a teleport skill, and a skill to swap places with its master. Increases damage by [1]% and maximum Vitality by 15%.
Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 2 for the duration.
Prevent statuses which grants a death resist effect to be applied.
Character body is covered with inflammable oil.
The first skill used each turn has its cooldown reduced by one turn (minimum 1).
Ambidextrous reduces the cost of using grenades and scrolls by 1 AP when your off-hand is free. Refund the AP cost for 2 equipment switches per turn (except for Crossbows).
Arrow Recovery provides a 33% chance to recover a special arrow after shooting it, and removes the close-quarters damage penalty of ranged weapons.

A character with Demon has an extra 20% Fire Resistance, but takes a 15% penalty to Water Resistance. Additionally, the maximum Fire Resistance is raised by 10 and grants immunity to Burning and Necrofire.

A character with [1] has an extra 20% [3], but takes a [4]% penalty to [5]. Additionally, the maximum [3] is raised by [6]. Demon grants immunity to Burning and Necrofire. Ice King increases all Water damage you deal by 20% and grants immunity to Chilled.
[1] lets you evade attacks of opportunity. Increases your Dodge by 5% and Movement by 1m per AP.
Duelist increases AP Start and Recovery by 1, and Max AP by 1, if you are wielding a Single-Handed weapon with a free off-hand.
Ranged weapons (including wands) deal 20% additional damage of the type of the surface the target stands on. Using a grenade or an arrow also now provide 1 turn of Elemental Weapons of the same type.
[1] allows you to flee combat even when enemies are close by. Provides immunity to Crippled, Entangled and Enwebbed.
[1] gives you [2] extra Action Points after dealing a killing blow once per turn and increase Movement by 2m for 1 turn.
With [1], you start every combat round with Maximum AP, but Magic and Physical Armour are nullified and do not protect you from statuses.

Your attacks never miss but cannot deal critical strikes (except backstabs not triggered by skills and if your weapon has higher level than you). Convert the critical bonus from Wits to resistance bypass.
While above 75% Vitality, Hothead provides 10% Critical Chance and 10% Accuracy.

A character with Ice King has an extra 20% Water Resistance, but takes a 15% penalty to Fire Resistance. Additionally, the maximum Water Resistance is raised by 10. All Water damage you deal are increased by 20% and grants immunity to Chilled.

You gain immunity to stunned, frozen, knocked down, polymorphed, petrified, crippled for 1 turn after being affected by one of these statuses. Can happen once every 3 turns. Increase the duration of Momentum and Lingering by 1 turn.
Leech heals you when standing in blood. Also increases Lifesteal by 25%.

At the start of an encounter, you gain one of two statuses: Cycle of Fire and Water or Cycle of Earth and Air. Cycle of Fire and Water increases your Pyrokinetic and Hydrosophist by 3. Cycle of Earth and Air increases your Geomancy and Aerotheurgy by 3. Statuses swap each turn.
Mnenomic doubles all points invested in Memory.

When resurrected, you resurrect to full health. When your turn is skipped because of incapacitating effect(s), you start your next turn with 2 additional AP. You also start combat with 2 stacks of Warmup.
[1] gives you [2]% Dodging while dual wielding.
Pet Pal enables you to talk to animals. Also increases your maximum number of summons by 1, but reduces their damage and Vitality by 50%.
[1] gives all magical skills a critical chance equal to your critical chance score, and increase your Critical chance by 10%.
[1] adds an extra [2]m range to your grenade throws and increase their damage by 30%.

When an allied character dies, a Zombie Crawler is raised at their corpse, under their control. Zombie Crawler lasts 3 turns or until character is resurrected. Range 12m. Does not affect summoned creatures. Can happen only once per turn.
Stench decreases everyone's attitude towards you by [2], but melee opponents find you less attractive in combat. Increases your Poison resistance by 30% and makes you immune to Diseased and Infected.

Walk It Off reduces all status durations by 1 turn, including positive statuses. Does not affect statuses with a duration of 1 turn. Also increases elemental resistances by 8% and Physical and Piercing resistances by 4% each time you are directly hit by a character, up to a maximum of 3 times until the next turn.
